survey_name: Sustainable Office Practices Employee Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on current sustainable office practices and identify areas for improvement to enhance environmental responsibility within the workplace.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the sustainable office practices currently implemented in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the sustainable office practices currently implemented in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office practices are currently available in your workplace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Randomize options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office practices are currently available in your workplace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the current sustainable office practices? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Include a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the current sustainable office practices? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)

questions.question_text: What additional sustainable practices would you like to see implemented in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Provide a text box.

script.question_text: What additional sustainable practices would you like to see implemented in your workplace?

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in sustainable office practices (e.g., recycling, reducing paper use)?

script.question_text: How often do you participate in sustainable office practices (e.g., recycling, reducing paper use)?

questions.question_text: Which of the following barriers prevent you from participating in sustainable office practices? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q5 response is 'Sometimes', 'Rarely', or 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field.

script.question_text: Which of the following barriers prevent you from participating in sustainable office practices? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q5 response is 'Sometimes', 'Rarely', or 'Never'

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in attending workshops or training sessions on sustainable office practices?

script.question_text: Would you be interested in attending workshops or training sessions on sustainable office practices?

questions.question_text: What motivates you to participate in sustainable office practices? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q5 response is 'Always', 'Often', or 'Sometimes'
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Randomize options to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field.

script.question_text: What motivates you to participate in sustainable office practices? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q5 response is 'Always', 'Often', or 'Sometimes'

questions.question_text: How effective do you think the current communication about sustainable office practices is?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clarity.

script.question_text: How effective do you think the current communication about sustainable office practices is?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving sustainable office practices in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Provide a text box.

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving sustainable office practices in your workplace?
